mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_ID AS requestId ,ORDER_ID AS orderId ,ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus ,TO_CHAR(REQUEST_REG_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI:SS') AS requestRegDate ,TO_CHAR(REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI:SS') AS requestUpdateDate ,REQUEST_TYPE AS requestType ,PRODUCT_NAME AS productName ,USER_ID AS userId FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} ORDER BY REQUEST_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_DETAIL SET ORDER_STATUS = #{status} WHERE ORDER_ID = (SELECT ORDER_ID FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId})
